attributes.action: Lower the volume of adverts between TV Programmes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the Government to act on the abusive use of volume changes during the advertisement breaks on commercial TV. There is no need for it, and I think everyone is wise to it now and just switches off or mutes, so it would actually be better for the advertisers if the volume was kept at the same level.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
